attributes.action: Seriously consider bidding for WrestleMania 32 to be at Wembley. The income alone would be worth it if successful.
attributes.additional_details:
At first glance it may look a very clichéd petition, but I really feel that the Government should bid to have WrestleMania 32 in the UK, and to be held at Wembley. We've shown with the NFL crossover that sporting events from the USA can be very successful in our country in terms of tourism, business and most importantly, income.

Please consider this proposal, as the results (income especially), if successful, would be more than worth it.
